basics.summary: Seasoned software developer offering 12+ years of experience building 3 Android and desktop web browsers, hundreds of open source projects, performant apps, and language standards. Strong leadership qualities, with an innate ability to steer, empower, and motivate several cross-functional teams to increase overall work efficiency, while promoting technical environment and attaining collective goals. Continuously learning and staying up to date with the latest advancements in software engineering.

work.name: Microsoft
highlights: Doubled rendering performance and saved engineering time across all of Microsoft by leading UI framework migration process with designers, product managers, and engineers in 3 orgs and multiple teams.
Centralized business logic between the web, **iOS**, & **Android** apps by advising on code sharing with **React Native**.

Played a key role as **React, TypeScript, CSS, and HTML subject matter expert** to strengthen performance, accessibility, & internationalization by coaching 50+ engineers, developing automated tools, giving tech talks, writing articles.
Proactively identified hundreds of bugs in 5,000+ files by introducing and implementing automated **CI/CD** tooling.
Removed 1.5 seconds from repeat loads with **offline database** caching and rendering performance improvements.
Unlocked key features by inventing novel virtualization system to support users with 1,000+ pages shared with them.

work.name: Mozilla
highlights: Built and shipped brand new Android web browser in **Kotlin** to 100M+ users on Google Play Store.

Bridged communication gap with Google and Intel developers to add maskable icon support to Firefox and Chrome Android, which made thousands of web apps on par with Android apps in the home screen and drove web app adoption.
Featured Firefox in front of hundreds at Chrome Dev Summit 2019 keynote by adding Trusted Web Activity support.
Set web and Android interaction standards by writing specifications as **World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)** member.

work.name: Google
work.position: Software Engineering Intern - Chrome for Android
highlights: Increased new user retention, saved 100+ KB by designing & building internal tool to analyze millions of APK methods.
Prevented significant release schedule delays by proactively identifying **Java** resource limits that were to be exceeded.
Improved time to first render by **700%** by using streams and **background worker threads** to handle 180 MB downloads.

work.name: Centre for Sustainable Food Systems at UBC Farm

projects.name: Open Source

Wrote new features for various code linter packages used by **5M+ developers daily**.

projects.name: Speaking and Writing

Authored guidebook on **MockK** testing library for **Kotlin** and **Android**, with **20,000+ views/month**.
Wrote React to **Jetpack Compose** Dictionary, resource recommended by Android team to new developers.
Wrote software development articles for **CSS Tricks**, **MDN**, and **web.dev** with thousands of views.
Mentoring new software developers through volunteering at Ada Developers Academy.
